item.title: Target and Ulta just broke up: Employees raised red flags about shoplifting, understaffing, and foot-traffic cannibalization
item.description: The two retailers announced today they’ve “mutually agreed” to end the partnership when their current agreement expires in August 2026.

item.title: Canada Goose boss avoided printing ‘CEO’ on business cards for years after taking over at 27
item.description: When Dani Reiss was promoted to Canada Goose's top job at 27 years old, he couldn’t bring himself to proudly print his shiny new CEO title on paper

item.title: ‘This is the Cuban Missile Crisis in space’: Russia is building a space nuke that could wipe out every satellite in orbit, U.S. warns
item.description: “If this anti-satellite nuclear weapon would be put in space, it would be the end of the space age,” Rep. Mike Turner said.

item.title: ‘DEI’ as a dirty word: Companies are saying a lot less about diversity and equity in public filings
item.description: Use of the word “DEI” declined 68% from 2024 to 2025 in the major filings of the largest U.S. public companies. Words like words “diversity,” “racial,...

item.title: Zohran Mamdani met his wife on Hinge. Many American muslims meet their marriage partners in similar ways
item.description: Mamdani’s success on Hinge, and the show “Muslim Matchmaker” on Hulu, provide a glimpse into some of the ways American Muslims meet their spouses, fro...
